title: Kodi Kodi Minnalgal Lyrics Jayam
stanzas:
Kodi kodi minnalgal
oadi vandhu paayudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

oadi vandha vaarthaigal
oasai indri thaeyudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

moochile pudhu vaasanai
idhu yaenammaa
ilaiya manadhil kaadhal
pirandha neramaa.

Kodi kodi minnalgal
oadi vandhu paayudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

saaral vizhum neram
vaanavillai pole
thondridum azhagaana kadhal.

oasai indru vandhu
ullukkule vaazhum
ilamaiyin sangeetham kadhal.

rail-in oasai ingae
suga naadha swarangal aaga.
idhayam irandum
inaindhu oadumaa.

azhagu paadham paarthu
avan suppra paadham
paada sinungum kolusu
shruthi serkkumaa

Kodi kodi minnalgal
oadi vandhu paayudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

thendral ena vandhu
thottu sendra kaadhal
kalandhatho moochodu indru

kadhal ennum vaarthai
adhu vaarthai alla vazhkai.
vazhndhu paarthu
nee sollammaa.

inaiya vendum manadhu
idhu iraivan seidha mudivu
maatri kolla maalai vendumaa.

Kodi kodi minnalgal
oadi vandhu paayudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

oadi vandha vaarthaigal
oasai indri thaeyudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi

moochile pudhu vaasanai
idhu yaenammaa
ilaiya manadhil kaadhal
pirandha neramaa.

Kodi kodi minnalgal
oadi vandhu paayudhe
yaenadi yaenadi yaenadi
